thread.title: Penney from CT
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Penney from CT

author: Penney from CT
title: Penney from CT
text: The quality of the puzzles is excellent and they are very sturdy pieces and a great size. I feel they can be a bit pricey, but they do have a great variety and I will continue to buy them. They come now with a stand that holds the box top up so you can see the picture in front of you.
